_README: Manual overrides for launches. Use launch ID or slug as the key. These override auto-detection.

_HOW_TO_USE.step1: Find the launch on the site and click it to see details
_HOW_TO_USE.step2: Open browser DevTools (F12) and look at the console
_HOW_TO_USE.step3: You'll see the launch ID logged when you click a card
_HOW_TO_USE.step4: Copy that ID and use it as the key in this file

fields.direction: Text telling guests which way to look
fields.rtls: true if the booster comes back to the Cape
fields.chrisSays: Object with summary, tips array, and optional rtlsTimeline
